Some time ago a visionary Kerbal dreams about having a space society, where Kerbals travel to one planet to another at their wish. Today we can contemplate the beginning of that dream...

I present you my proyect, Kerbal Space Society.

Step 1: Out of Kerbin

So, you want to spend you vacation on the mun? or wanna migrate to another celestial body? The first step, of course, is buy a ticket to get out of Kerbin and travel to orbit. Here is the Koeing-324 - Class 1 spaceplane, designed to send 24 passengers (28 with crew) to orbit.

Step 2: Kerbin Transfer Station

This plane transport you to the Kerbin Transfer Station. This Station, totally functional by now, is expansible to compensate the increasing demands we expect to the future. In the future you will be able to chose between spending a couple on days in the installations as vacation or to take the next trip to the next Transfer Station. We expect that some day the station will have cinemas,zero G bowling, swimming pool, programed space walk and many more... but for now, itÃ‚Â´s only a place where yo wait for the next destination.

Step 3: Flight to the next Transfer Station

Here you have two options: an interplanetary travel or a visit to one of the moons of Kerbin. For a trip to one of the moons you can take your ticket in one of the Koeing-524 - Class 1 vessels. This Vessel can transport up to 24 Kerbal to any point of Kerbin system.

If you want to travel to another planet you must take one of the Koeing-624 models, still under development. As the proyects is still on his beginning there is no Transfer Station or outpost in any celestial boy out of Kerbin Sphere of influence.

Step 4: Taking the lander

Once you arrived to the orbit of the celestial body of your desire you will be dock to itÃ‚Â´s Transfer Station, where you once again can chose if you wanna stay in orbit or go a little further. If you want to visit the planet/moon installations you have to take the Koeing-408 - Class 1 (Class 2 under development right now). Here we can see the Mun Transfer Station with a Koeing-524 docked and a Koeing-408 in itÃ‚Â´s way to the Mun City.

Step 5: Final destination (not like the movie... I hope)

And at least,spend a couple of days, a week, or your entire life in one of the cities outside Kerbin. Here is the Mun city, the first one and for the moment the only one outside Kerbin.

Step 6: Whatps next?

As said before, this is just the beginning, these are the expected bases of the proyect:

- Transfer Stations: around Kerbol, Eve, Duna, Jool, and one of itÃ‚Â´s moons, and Eloo.

- Cities: Eve, Duna, two Jool moonÃ‚Â´s, and Eloo.
